extendedInfo.description: Get ready to experience our completely re-imagined Fly Delta app for Android. We listened to your feedback and added many innovative new features to our award-winning app, including the ability to shop for flights.â¢ Find, compare and book Domestic and International flightsâ¢ Purchase Economy Comfort and other seat products and Trip Extras, including in-flight Wi-Fi, Priority Boarding and moreâ¢ Rebook cancelled flights or missed connectionsâ¢ Manage your trips, profile and transactions, and customize your travel preferencesâ¢ Check your SkyMilesÂ® account balance and current MedallionÂ® statusâ¢ Check in and download your eBoarding Pass (available at select airports worldwide)â¢ Pay for checked bags and track their locationâ¢ Check the latest flight status and receive flight and gate change notificationsâ¢ Save a photo to remember your parking spotâ¢ Check your status on the upgrade or standby listâ¢ View or change your seatâ¢ Locate Delta Sky ClubÂ® loungesâ¢ View expanded airport maps, public transportation details and weather informationâ¢ Get detailed info about our fleet and partnersâ¢ Map flights en route with an interactive flight trackerThe Fly Delta app for Android and delta.com are always free to use on Deltaâs Wi-Fi-enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.Delta Air Lines serves more than 160 million customers each year. With its unsurpassed global network, Delta and its partner airlines offer service to more than 350 destinations in nearly 70 countries on six continents.

reviews.title: Problem loggin in
reviews.comment: Having issues when I have more than one login account.  When I have two separate accounts, the second account pulls up the first accounts info. I can\'t find a way around this.
reviews.author: Thaddeus Maciag

reviews.title: Lots of crashes
reviews.comment: Have to do everything twice with this app. The first time, it crashes. It usually works on the second try though.
reviews.author: Chris McConville

reviews.title: Boarding pass won\'t load
reviews.comment: Updated app to new version and now getting an error. \'comment not terminated\'  when trying to pull up boarding pass.
reviews.author: John Councilman

reviews.title: Boarding pass fix
reviews.comment: I found a great fix for having the E-boarding pass ready at all times. Once I have it pulled up at home, I then take a screen grab of it on my phone. I can pull up the screen grab anytime without being on a network and it scans just fine at the gate.
reviews.author: jeff Nelson

reviews.title: Will NOT work on my Glaxy S4!!!
reviews.comment: I had this app on my Motorola Razr HD and loved it.  I have this app on my Samsung Note 8 and I love it.   I downloaded on my NEW Galaxy S4 and WILL NOT let me log in at all.  Not once. I have tried my Skymiles number, my email, my user ID and nothing works. Does anyone have any suggestions because Delta tells me there is no issue with any Samsung device...YES THERE IS!!! One star for my Samsung Galaxy S4.
reviews.author: Scott East

reviews.title: Should be named Delta.
reviews.comment: This app would be great if it allowed off-line access to Boarding passes. Also, why \"Fly Delta\"? That just makes it hard to find in an alphabet list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I used this all the time ans its the best ever!
reviews.author: Mandy Harbsion

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Constantly stuck at \"loading your information,\" and blank boarding passes when it does finish. Great the 1% of the time it actually works, but not worth the trouble. Easier and less frustrating to just get a paper ticket.
reviews.author: Joe Lafoon

reviews.title: I love you Delta!
reviews.comment: My favorite app ever! Easy to use, updated regularly, secure, fast, easy, great design, absolutely awesome! Delta is the ONLY airline I fly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding realntime re-routing
reviews.comment: The options to re route missed connections is real time and very impressive.  From cvg-bos-lhr, weather caused delays in Boston.   Fly delta gave me an option to hop on a cvg-dtw-lhr flight that got me there in the same time.  Now if delta would only bring some direct  flights back to cvg, I would use this app much more....
reviews.author: Brandan Jones

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Liked old version quite a bit but recent update refuses to run at all. First time I got to login screen and crashed, but now it goes directly to crash. Not at all pleased.
reviews.author: Bob Klemm

reviews.title: Horrid
reviews.comment: I\'ve reinstalled a couple times now and it still doesn\'t work. Huge fail. You can run an airline but can\'t find someone to write a decent app?
reviews.author: Sheila Ackerman

reviews.title: Useful but slow
reviews.comment: Incredibly slow to start up and load data even when using sprint 4g with full bars. Very useful for checking checking flight status and gates. Just wish it could get me the data quicker.
reviews.author: Debbie Bernier

reviews.title: App keeps Stopping
reviews.comment: App stops always during my check in process. It would be a excellent app but its not if I can perform a important task.
reviews.author: Scott Ford

reviews.title: e-Boarding Pass Failed
reviews.comment: Tried to use the e-Boarding Pass feature. Thank goodness I printed one \"just in case\" and glad I did! The e-pass didn\'t even work. The  agent who dealt with me grinned and said this feature is haphazard at best and advised me and a few others in line to always carry a hard copy for this very reason. Sorry Delta, your IT staff have a long way to go before using smartphones for every step of a customer\'s flight is digitally smooth! Great app for checking flight status, though, but not much else.
reviews.author: Don Brunmeier

reviews.title: Very convenient, but could use some UX improvements
reviews.comment: Suggestions:  a) if I\'m within 30 minutes of my boarding time, it would be nice if the app launched right to the boarding pass for my flight. There are too many clicks to get to the boarding pass when you want it.  b) it would be nice if the app could override screen timeout while I\'m viewing the boarding pass. It seems inevitable that everyone in the security line times out just before the TSA is ready to look at the next person. Minor, but when you add it up over a lot of people in line, it might make a difference. (only really an issue at security lines btw. The gate agents are faster and it\'s not a big problem there).   Other than that those few useful improvements, I love it. Thanks Delta.
reviews.author: Richard Smith

reviews.title: Badly Needs QA
reviews.comment: Good app, but has some fatal flaws that need to be addressed.  Really hoping that Delta reads through these comments and creates action items for their mobile development team to work through.  -- Even when my flight is delayed by 5 minutes, the app sends me through a process to choose an alternate flight even though I\'m perfectly fine with being able to take the original flight.  Worst of all, it no longer shows me my original boarding pass.  Now I have to go to the gate agent an request a paper pass, so in essence the mobile app\'s bug is causing more work for the Delta staff on the ground.  -- After checking in with the app (usually about 23-24 hours from departure when I get the notification), I usually want to see if the seat next to me is open or if I can change my seat.  Every time I try, I get the message along the lines that it \"cannot load the seat map at this time\" and it kicks me back to the main itinerary screen.  I then have to open my laptop in order to complete this process.
reviews.author: Zoey Cole

reviews.title: Download failures
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to get this to my Galaxy Note 10.1, it fails.......useless.
reviews.author: Gregg Starks

reviews.title: Hopeless app
reviews.comment: Great airline.  Aweful app. For the last 6 months cannot even chk u in. Buying tickets is out of the question.  Tech team - call the guys at Kayak or expedia. Maybe they will teach you something about app development.
reviews.author: Rajib Das

reviews.comment: Regular effort to improve and enhance paying off. If only the rest of Delta\'s IT were as good.
reviews.author: A Google User
